H3.text: when is the last time the giants won the world series. 2012 World Series

A4.text: The Giants swept the Series in four games to win their first championship since 1933, defeating the heavily favored Indians, who had won an AL-record 111 games in the 154-game regular season.

A5.text: The Giants would eventually end the curse in 2010 over the Texas Rangers in five games, which marked the start of a dynasty for the Giants.

A6.text: The 1954 World Series title would be their last appearance in the World Series as the New York Giants.

A7.text: The Giants won the first two World Series in the early 1920s over the Yankees.
